original_title: WWE In Your House 14: Revenge of the Taker
overview: Stone Cold Steve Austin battles Bret "The Hitman" Hart to determine the number one contender for the WWE Championship. The Undertaker defends the WWE Championship against Mankind. The Rock defends the WWE Intercontinental Title against Savio Vega and much more!
title: WWE In Your House 14: Revenge of the Taker
